message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a method for text localization and recognition in scene images, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a novel feature based on character stroke area estimation, which involves image processing and machine learning techniques, and can be related to cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
